---
title: EASTWAY CONTRACTING
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: eastway_contracting
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $340.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with EASTWAY CONTRACTING. The average
  contract duration was 0.37 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $313.7K.
  The longest contract was 3.13 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $4.1M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '340.6K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '32'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '4'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '0%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-41.6K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.37'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '313.7K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '3.13'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '4.1M'
---
